title: Magnificent Mayura Haaram with Emerald Accents

description: This is a statement piece that blends traditional South Indian design with modern aesthetics. The combination of high-quality diamonds and Zambian emeralds ensures lasting value and brilliance. The Mayura motif holds cultural significance and symbolizes grace.
